pages.title: Golden Cake
pages.text: The butterfly jar is the center of functionality for any good butterfly connoisseur. Capture any butterfly using a butterfly net or an enderfly net and right click a jar with it to put the butterfly inside the jar. Once inside the jar, the butterfly will begin to help you. Each butterfly has a unique function when they are inside of a jar.
